description:
This mod decreases the grind to make your game easier.

!! READ THIS !!

Any issues/bugs you encounter should be reported at https://github.com/CodeRadu/less-grind/issues

Features:
Craft component kits
Trade component kits
More component kits from chests
A LOT more circuit boards from bots
A LOT more glue clams
More Paint Flowers
More Cotton
More Beewax

See more features and plans here: https://github.com/CodeRadu/less-grind/blob/main/README.md

More stuff comming soon!
name: Less Grind
